The infographic shared by India Today ne: which listed the prices of vaccines in different countries including India, China, US, EU, Russia, Saudi Arabia, South Africa, and Brazil.
The claim made by BJP quoting media repo: in-India COVID vaccines have the lowest prices in the world if any eligible citizen chooses to pay.
The Ministry of Health and Family Welfar: s guidance document COWIN 2.0, which states that vaccination will be provided free of charge at government health facilities and on a payment basis in private health facilities.
The announcement by the Indian governmen: which contradicts the price mentioned in the India Today graphic and the cost of vaccines for Indian private markets in UNICEF's data.
